column4: anyone know if I'm able to install ubuntu on a separate partition, but from another partition running windows, use Linux on the other partition through something like vmware?
try xen if you got a recent processor it might work with a lot of work
scguy318 , didn't know I use virtualbox or qemu - good to know
well I wasn't asking if just vmware did it but if anything was able to, now I know vmware does, that'd be cool if virtualbox did too though
